name: Blind Knight's Tale
description:
My entry for the Brackey's Game Jam #2, and the first project I ever made since I only started a few months back.

I tried to make a game you can play on your own or with someone else in local coop (one player stirs the knight, while the other can use the mouse to direct the princess's voice towards the platforms).

I had a ton of fun making this project but I couldn't add the last two levels due to computer-breaking bugs. I'll definitely revisit the concept + characters in the future though (when I have more time :P)

Thanks to Brackeys for organising the jam! Can't wait to play all the other entries!!!
